text: We visited Dr Richard Quek in 2022 September where he correctly diagnosed our motherâ€™s cancer. Since then, him and his team (especially Carol and Chris) have been so proactive and supportive towards us. His diagnosis has always been spot on. Because of him, my mother has been in good hands for over two years.
One of the best cancer center in singapore. Very friendly and professional staff and doctors. I come here as well to see my oncologist regularly and so far everything is well. Highly recommended

The staff here are very friendly, i have been sseing Dr foo since 2014.He is very detailed and patience with me all the time.Nurses are very caring and skillful. Highly recommended to come for the high quality service here. Appreciate all the staff in the past 10year.
Very friendly, professional and caring staff and doctors. I have been seeing my oncologist Dr Richard Quek since 2021. Newly renovated clinic and treatment area. Highly recommended

Came here for a consultation with Dr Richard Quek for my son. It was worth our trip.  Such a professional and ethical Doctor with so much of compassion.  Had been communicating with Dr Quek via email few weeks prior to my visit and each time Dr Quek had taken the time to answer my mails.  So grateful to him. All of Dr Quek's assistants were just as friendly and helpful.  This is the place to to go for cancer treatments if you had the means.
